LanguageData.WVC_XaG_ResetButtonWarning: The settings will be changed, are you sure?
LanguageData.WVC_BiotechSettings_Tooltip_Info:
Settings responsible for information in the interface.
It is recommended to enable all settings for the first acquaintance with the mod. Or disable all settings for a very small performance boost.
LanguageData.WVC_BiotechSettings_Tooltip_Genes: Settings responsible for the special effects of genes.
LanguageData.WVC_BiotechSettings_Tooltip_Other: Settings not related to anything specific.
LanguageData.WVC_BiotechSettings_Tooltip_Serums: Settings responsible for the generation of serums. If game launch too long, it is recommended to disable all.
LanguageData.WVC_BiotechSettings_XenotypesFilter_Titl: Set xenotypes that can be used for serums. Restart is required.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_disableFurGraphic:
Turns off the visual changes introduced by (...)skins.
A restart is required to apply the setting. Required new game!
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_disableAllGraphic:
Completely removes all graphic elements of the mod.
Requires a restart, a new game and that the previous setting is enabled.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_disableUniqueGeneInterface:
Responsible for displaying the unique background and additional information of the gene.
If enabled, then all genes of the mod will have a vanilla interface.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_enableGenesInfo:
Responsible for displaying gene information. For example, for spawner genes: time, name and count.
Activation requires a restart, deactivation does not.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_fixVanillaGeneImmunityCheck: If enabled, it fix the gene check for disease immunity by adding a check for gene activity. Thus, genes that add immunity will not provide immunity when overridden by other genes.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_enableCustomMechLinkName:
If enabled, the name of the mechlink will be replaced with the name of the gene that this mechlink gives. Works only with genes from the mod.
Does not affect already spawned mechlinks.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_minWastepacksPerRecharge:
Force the minimum amount of waste produced by mechanoids, preventing it from dropping below 1.
A restart is required to apply the setting.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_validatorAbilitiesPatch:
A patch that adds checks to non-mod reimplanters. This is to make genes like "genetic stability" work properly with other reimplanters. For example, for the vanilla gene implanter.
A restart is required to apply the setting. Enabled by default.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_totalHealingIgnoreScarificat: If enabled, genes that heal scars will ignore ideological scarification. Only affects genes from the mod.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_generateTemplateGenes:
If enabled, the corresponding genes will be generated at startup.
A restart is required to apply the setting.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_generateSkinHairColorGenes:
If enabled, generates genes for hair and skin with colors corresponding to the materials available in the game.
A restart is required to apply the setting.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_genesRemoveMechlinkUponDeath:
If enabled, then in case of death the mechlink will be removed from pawns with the corresponding gene.
Please note that resurrecting a pawn will not bring back a disappeared mechlink.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_canNonPlayerPawnResurrect: Gene "Undead" allows pawns to be resurrected instantly upon death. If disabled, pawns not controlled by the player will always die. This affects prisoners, rebellious slaves, guests and enemies.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_allowShapeshiftAfterDeath: Xenotype "Undead" after death being resurrected by gene "Undead" changes the set of genes.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_spawnXenoForcerSerumsFromTra: If enabled, traders will sell basetype, ultratype and hybridtype serums. Restart required.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_serumsForAllXenotypes:
Affects whether serums for all possible xenotypes will be generated. Does not affect custom ones. Restart required.
May affect startup speed on modlists with a lot of mods that add xenotypes.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_serumsForAllXenotypes_GenBas: Responsible for generating serums that can be crafted.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_serumsForAllXenotypes_GenUlt: Responsible for the generation of serums that can be purchased or spawned using the gene of the same name.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_serumsForAllXenotypes_GenHyb: Responsible for the generation of serums with two xenotypes that can only be purchased or spawned with the gene of the same name.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_serumsForAllXenotypes_Recipe: If enabled, it creates a recipe for each serum, allowing it to be used through the "Operation" menu, in the pawn's health tab. Restart required.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_serumsSpawnersForAllXenotype: If enabled, a spawner gene will be added for each serum. Restart required.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_fixGenesOnLoad: If enabled, it should fix all potentially broken genes. Please note that this will reset the cumulative effects of genes, such as deathrest (deathrest capacity serums).
LanguageData.WVC_Label_fixGeneAbilitiesOnLoad: Fix broken gene abilities on load
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_fixGeneAbilitiesOnLoad: If enabled, it should fix all potentially broken abilities. Please note that this will reset all gene abilities.
LanguageData.WVC_Alert_fixBrokenShit:
How to use: Enable and load any save.
It is not recommended to use more than one DEV-fix at a time. It might break something.
